name: Soluble Components
body:
## Welcome to Soluble Components .

Soluble components is a set of PHP5.3+ components easily injectable in your project. Soluble is written
in PHP 5.3 using namespaces and following PSR-2 recommendation. The code is hosted on GitHub and available on packagist.

## Documentation
The documentation is hosted on http://soluble-components.readthedocs.org/en/latest/

## Components
### Normalist


### FexStore
